dt: {bc}the act of officially ending or stopping something {bc}the act of {d_link|abolishing|abolish} something

et: borrowed from Middle French & Latin; Middle French {it}abolition{/it}, borrowed from Latin {it}abolitiōn-, abolitiō{/it}, from {it}aboli-{/it}, variant stem of {it}abolēre{/it} "to {et_link|abolish|abolish}" + {it}-tiōn-, -tiō{/it}, suffix of action nouns
shortdef: the act of officially ending or stopping something : the act of abolishing something
the act of officially ending slavery
